businessObjective: Digitize an existing offline cardiac ECG service into a national-scale on-demand mobile healthcare platform.
platform: Cross-platform mobile app (Android + iOS + Play Instant support)

features.name: Install from shared link
features.description: Users receive installation link via SMS when contacting customer care offline.

features.name: App Store Access
features.description: Install via Play Store / App Store.

features.name: OTP Login
features.description: Login with mobile number and OTP verification.

features.name: Google Play Instant Launch
features.description: App experience launches instantly for users without installing fully.

features.name: Emergency Information Hub
features.description: Checklist and symptom-based guidance via video and educational content.

features.name: Multi-Action Emergency Contact
features.description: Call PHC, send WhatsApp message, or request technician.

features.name: Hospital Suggestions
features.description: Nearest hospital recommendations if symptoms suggest urgency.

features.name: ECG Request Entry Point
features.description: Start workflow for service request if symptoms unclear.

features.name: Request ECG
features.description: User submits request for technician home visit.

features.name: Technician Assignment
features.description: Backend assigns technician — technician app handles workflows (out of scope).

features.name: Real-Time Tracking
features.description: User sees technician live location + ETA on map.

features.name: Report Routing
features.description: Technician completes ECG and sends results to doctor (tech app flow).

features.name: My Profile
features.description: Create personal profile after OTP login.

features.name: Family Member Profiles
features.description: Add and manage profiles for relatives under same phone number.

features.name: Shared Data Access
features.description: All profiles under one number visible after login.

features.name: Upload Reports
features.description: Upload existing medical reports for doctor visibility.

features.name: Member-Wise Repository
features.description: Reports categorized under each family member profile.

features.name: Invoice Generation
features.description: Auto-generated invoice after ECG booking.

features.name: Payment Handling
features.description: Redirect to payment gateway or accept UPI via QR.

features.name: Submit Feedback
features.description: Users share post-service feedback. Visible in backend only.

features.name: Usage Analytics
features.description: Integrate mobile analytics (e.g., Firebase/GA) for insights.

scopeNotes: Technician app functionality is out of scope (only integration point needed).
Payment design not required — only workflow and redirection.
Feedback view is backend-only; no UI complications needed.
